content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While discussing as Peter Schmidt, I find this newly built one-bedroom apartment highly desirable due to its prime city center location and modern features. However, being a cautious landlord, I must ensure a profitable rental agreement. Let's start the negotiation with an initial price of 1100 Euros per month. Max, if you're interested in this apartment but find my proposal too high, please suggest an alternative figure. If we reach a mutually satisfactory price, I'll gladly agree to it. If not, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm committed to maintaining a lucrative rental income.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the details, Mr. Schmidt. However, as a diligent student with a keen eye for value, I must express my concern regarding the proposed price of 1100 Euros per month for this apartment. I'm looking to minimize my expenses while maintaining a clean and comfortable living space. With this in mind, I would like to propose a lowered price of 950 Euros monthly. If you find this more acceptable, I'll gladly accept the new terms. If not, I regret having to withdraw from this negotiation due to our inability to reach a mutually satisfactory agreement on price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Considering your financial situation as a student, I understand your need to minimize expenses. However, being a landlord who aspires to maximize the return on investment, it's challenging to accept your proposed price of 950 Euros per month for this highly sought-after apartment in the city center. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my primary objective is to secure a rental income that justifies the property's value. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
